member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.IMarketDataProvider
member.summary: Interface for accessing market data including option chains and historical prices. Implementations might use Yahoo Finance, IEX Cloud, or other data providers.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.IMarketDataProvider.GetOptionChain(System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Retrieves the complete option chain for a symbol on a specific date.
member.param: The date for which to retrieve the option chain.
member.returns: The option chain with all available expiration dates and strikes.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.IMarketDataProvider.GetHistoricalPrices(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves historical OHLC price data for volatility calculations.
member.param: Number of historical days to retrieve.
member.returns: List of price bars ordered chronologically.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.IMarketDataProvider.GetCurrentPrice(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the current market price of a security.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.IMarketDataProvider.GetEarningsDates(System.String)
member.summary: Gets upcoming earnings announcement dates.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.IMarketDataProvider.IsDataAvailable(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if market data is available for a symbol.

member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.PriceBar
member.summary: Represents a single bar of OHLCV price data.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.PriceBar.Date
member.summary: Gets or sets the date of this price bar.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.PriceBar.Open
member.summary: Gets or sets the opening price.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.PriceBar.High
member.summary: Gets or sets the highest price during the period.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.PriceBar.Low
member.summary: Gets or sets the lowest price during the period.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.PriceBar.Close
member.summary: Gets or sets the closing price.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.PriceBar.Volume
member.summary: Gets or sets the trading volume.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.PriceBar.AdjustedClose
member.summary: Gets or sets the adjusted closing price (adjusted for splits/dividends).

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.PriceBar.Validate
member.summary: Validates that OHLC data is consistent.

member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.IOptionPricingEngine
member.summary: Interface for pricing options using advanced models including negative rates. Implementations use the DoubleBoundaryEngine for accurate American option pricing.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.IOptionPricingEngine.PriceOption(Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionParameters)
member.summary: Prices a single American option using the double boundary engine. Supports both positive and negative interest rates.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.IOptionPricingEngine.PriceCalendarSpread(Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.CalendarSpreadParameters)
member.summary: Prices a calendar spread (long back month, short front month).
member.returns: Complete spread pricing including net Greeks and risk metrics.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.IOptionPricingEngine.CalculateImpliedVolatility(System.Double,Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionParameters)
member.summary: Calculates implied volatility from market price using bisection method.

member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.CalendarSpreadParameters
member.summary: Parameters for pricing a calendar spread.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.CalendarSpreadParameters.UnderlyingPrice
member.summary: Gets or sets the current price of the underlying security.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.CalendarSpreadParameters.Strike
member.summary: Gets or sets the strike price (same for both legs).

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.CalendarSpreadParameters.FrontExpiry
member.summary: Gets or sets the front month (short) expiration date.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.CalendarSpreadParameters.BackExpiry
member.summary: Gets or sets the back month (long) expiration date.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.CalendarSpreadParameters.ImpliedVolatility
member.summary: Gets or sets the implied volatility to use for pricing.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.CalendarSpreadParameters.RiskFreeRate
member.summary: Gets or sets the risk-free interest rate (can be negative).

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.CalendarSpreadParameters.DividendYield
member.summary: Gets or sets the continuous dividend yield (can be negative).

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.CalendarSpreadParameters.OptionType
member.summary: Gets or sets the option type (Call or Put).

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.CalendarSpreadParameters.ValuationDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the valuation date.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.CalendarSpreadParameters.Validate
member.summary: Validates the calendar spread parameters.

member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.UnifiedPricingEngine
member.summary: Unified pricing engine that automatically selects between Alaris.Double and Alaris.Quantlib based on interest rate regime. Supports both positive and negative interest rates.
member.remarks: Regime Detection: - If r >= 0: Use Alaris.Quantlib (standard American option pricing) - If r < 0 and q < r: Use Alaris.Double (double boundary method for negative rates) - If r < 0 and q >= r: Use Alaris.Quantlib (single boundary still applies)

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.UnifiedPricingEngine.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.UnifiedPricingEngine})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the UnifiedPricingEngine.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.UnifiedPricingEngine.DetermineRegime(System.Double,System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines the appropriate pricing regime based on interest rate, dividend yield, and option type.
member.param: The risk-free interest rate (can be negative).
The continuous dividend yield (can be negative).
True for call options, false for put options.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.UnifiedPricingEngine.PriceOption(Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionParameters)
member.summary: Prices a single American option using the appropriate pricing engine.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.UnifiedPricingEngine.PriceCalendarSpread(Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.CalendarSpreadParameters)
member.summary: Prices a calendar spread using the appropriate pricing engine for each leg.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.UnifiedPricingEngine.CalculateImpliedVolatility(System.Double,Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionParameters)
member.summary: Calculates implied volatility from market price using bisection method.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.UnifiedPricingEngine.PriceWithQuantlib(Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionParameters)
member.summary: Prices an option using the Alaris.Quantlib engine (standard American option pricing).

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.UnifiedPricingEngine.PriceWithDouble(Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionParameters)
member.summary: Prices an option using the Alaris.Double Healy (2021) framework for negative rates. Uses DoubleBoundaryApproximation with QD+ method and early exercise premium calculation.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.UnifiedPricingEngine.PriceOptionSync(Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionParameters)
member.summary: Synchronously prices an option for Greek calculations (QuantLib only). Creates a complete, fresh pricing infrastructure for accurate finite differences.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.UnifiedPricingEngine.CalculateMaxProfit(Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.CalendarSpreadParameters,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the maximum profit potential of a calendar spread using grid search.
member.param: The initial cost of the spread (debit paid).
member.returns: Maximum profit potential at front expiration.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.UnifiedPricingEngine.CalculateBreakEven(Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.CalendarSpreadParameters,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates the breakeven point(s) for a calendar spread using bisection method.
member.param: The initial cost of the spread (debit paid).
member.returns: Approximate breakeven underlying price at front expiration.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.UnifiedPricingEngine.CalculateIntrinsicValue(System.Double,System.Double,Option.Type)
member.summary: Calculates the intrinsic value of an option at expiration.

member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.PricingRegime
member.summary: Represents the pricing regime based on interest rate conditions.

member.name: F:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.PricingRegime.PositiveRates
member.summary: Standard regime with positive interest rates (r >= 0). Uses Alaris.Quantlib with single boundary.

member.name: F:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.PricingRegime.DoubleBoundary
member.summary: Double boundary regime with negative rates where q < r < 0. Uses Alaris.Double with double boundary method.

member.name: F:Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.PricingRegime.NegativeRatesSingleBoundary
member.summary: Negative rates but single boundary regime where r < 0 and q >= r. Uses Alaris.Quantlib with single boundary.

member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.Control
member.summary: Main control class for the earnings volatility calendar spread strategy. Orchestrates signal generation, position sizing, and trade execution.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Control.EvaluateOpportunity(System.String,System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Double,System.Collections.Generic.List{Alaris.Strategy.Risk.Trade})
member.summary: Evaluates a trading opportunity for a given symbol.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Control.CreateSpreadParameters(Alaris.Strategy.Core.Signal,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Creates calendar spread parameters from a signal.

member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.TradingOpportunity
member.summary: Represents a complete trading opportunity evaluation.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.TradingOpportunity.IsActionable
member.summary: Gets whether this opportunity is actionable.

member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.Core.Signal
member.summary: Represents a trading signal for earnings calendar spread strategy. Based on Atilgan (2014) volatility spread research.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.Signal.Symbol
member.summary: Gets or sets the underlying security symbol.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.Signal.Strength
member.summary: Gets or sets the signal strength classification.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.Signal.IVRVRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the IV/RV ratio (30-day implied volatility / 30-day realized volatility). Entry criterion: IV30/RV30 >= 1.25

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.Signal.TermStructureSlope
member.summary: Gets or sets the term structure slope (0-45 days). Entry criterion: Slope <= -0.00406

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.Signal.AverageVolume
member.summary: Gets or sets the average trading volume. Entry criterion: >= 1,500,000 shares

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.Signal.ExpectedMove
member.summary: Gets or sets the expected move percentage for the earnings event.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.Signal.EarningsDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the earnings announcement date.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.Signal.SignalDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date when the signal was generated.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.Signal.Criteria
member.summary: Gets or sets the individual criteria results.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.Signal.VolatilitySpread
member.summary: Gets or sets the volatility spread (put IV - call IV).

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.Signal.ImpliedVolatility30
member.summary: Gets or sets the 30-day implied volatility.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.Signal.RealizedVolatility30
member.summary: Gets or sets the 30-day realized volatility (Yang-Zhang estimator).

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Core.Signal.EvaluateStrength
member.summary: Evaluates all criteria and determines signal strength.

member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.Core.SignalStrength
member.summary: Signal strength classification for trading decisions.

member.name: F:Alaris.Strategy.Core.SignalStrength.Avoid
member.summary: Avoid taking a position - criteria not met.

member.name: F:Alaris.Strategy.Core.SignalStrength.Consider
member.summary: Consider taking a position - partial criteria met.

member.name: F:Alaris.Strategy.Core.SignalStrength.Recommended
member.summary: Recommended to take a position - all criteria met.

member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.Core.SignalGenerator
member.summary: Generates trading signals for earnings calendar spread opportunities. Implements the strategy from Atilgan (2014) and incorporates term structure analysis.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Core.SignalGenerator.Generate(System.String,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Generates a trading signal for a given symbol before an earnings announcement.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Core.SignalGenerator.ExtractTermStructurePoints(Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionChain,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Extracts term structure points from the option chain.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Core.SignalGenerator.CalculateExpectedMove(Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionChain,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Calculates the expected move from the ATM straddle price.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Core.SignalGenerator.CalculateVolatilitySpread(Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionChain,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Calculates the weighted volatility spread (put IV - call IV) as per Atilgan (2014).

member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.Core.TermStructure
member.summary: Analyzes the term structure of implied volatility. Used to identify inverted term structures that signal trading opportunities.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Core.TermStructure.Analyze(System.Collections.Generic.List{Alaris.Strategy.Core.TermStructurePoint})
member.summary: Analyzes a set of term structure points and calculates slope/intercept.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Core.TermStructure.CalculateRSquared(System.Double[],System.Double[],System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Calculates R-squared for the linear fit.

member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.Core.TermStructurePoint
member.summary: Represents a single point in the implied volatility term structure.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.TermStructurePoint.DaysToExpiry
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of days until option expiration.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.TermStructurePoint.ImpliedVolatility
member.summary: Gets or sets the implied volatility (annual, as a decimal).

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.TermStructurePoint.Strike
member.summary: Gets or sets the strike price of the option.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.TermStructurePoint.Metadata
member.summary: Gets or sets optional metadata about the option contract.

member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.Core.TermStructureAnalysis
member.summary: Results of term structure analysis including slope and intercept.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.TermStructureAnalysis.Intercept
member.summary: Gets or sets the intercept of the linear regression (IV at DTE=0).

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.TermStructureAnalysis.Slope
member.summary: Gets or sets the slope of the term structure. Negative slope indicates inverted term structure (backwardation).

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.TermStructureAnalysis.RSquared
member.summary: Gets or sets the R-squared value of the linear fit.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.TermStructureAnalysis.Points
member.summary: Gets or sets the original data points used in the analysis.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Core.TermStructureAnalysis.GetIVAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the implied volatility at a specific number of days to expiry.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.TermStructureAnalysis.IsInverted
member.summary: Determines if the term structure is inverted (negative slope).

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Core.TermStructureAnalysis.MeetsTradingCriterion
member.summary: Determines if the slope meets the trading criterion (slope <= -0.00406).

member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.Core.TermStructureAnalyzer
member.summary: Helper class for term structure analysis.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Core.TermStructureAnalyzer.Analyze(System.Collections.Generic.List{Alaris.Strategy.Core.TermStructurePoint})
member.summary: Analyzes term structure points.

member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.Core.YangZhangEstimator
member.summary: Implements the Yang-Zhang (2000) realized volatility estimator. This estimator is an efficient method that uses OHLC data and accounts for opening jumps. Formula: RV² = σ_o² + k·σ_c² + (1-k)·σ_rs²

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Core.YangZhangEstimator.Calculate(System.Collections.Generic.List{Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.PriceBar},System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculates the Yang-Zhang realized volatility estimate.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Core.YangZhangEstimator.Variance(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Double})
member.summary: Calculates sample variance using (n-1) denominator.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Core.YangZhangEstimator.CalculateRolling(System.Collections.Generic.List{Alaris.Strategy.Bridge.PriceBar},System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calculates a rolling Yang-Zhang volatility series.

member.summary: Gets or sets the best bid price.

member.summary: Gets or sets the best ask price.

member.summary: Gets or sets the option delta.

member.summary: Gets or sets the option gamma.

member.summary: Gets or sets the option vega.

member.summary: Gets or sets the option theta.

member.summary: Gets or sets the open interest (number of outstanding contracts).

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionContract.Volume
member.summary: Gets or sets the trading volume for the day.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionContract.MidPrice
member.summary: Gets the mid-point price between bid and ask.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionContract.BidAskSpread
member.summary: Gets the bid-ask spread.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionContract.ProportionalSpread
member.summary: Gets the proportional bid-ask spread.

member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionParameters
member.summary: Parameters required for pricing a single option contract.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionParameters.UnderlyingPrice
member.summary: Gets or sets the current price of the underlying security.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionParameters.Strike
member.summary: Gets or sets the strike price of the option.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionParameters.Expiry
member.summary: Gets or sets the expiration date.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionParameters.ImpliedVolatility
member.summary: Gets or sets the implied volatility (annual).

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionParameters.RiskFreeRate
member.summary: Gets or sets the risk-free interest rate (annual).

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionParameters.DividendYield
member.summary: Gets or sets the continuous dividend yield (annual).

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionParameters.OptionType
member.summary: Gets or sets the option type (Call or Put).

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionParameters.ValuationDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the valuation date (pricing date).

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Model.OptionParameters.Validate
member.summary: Validates the parameters for option pricing.

member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.CalendarSpreadPricing
member.summary: Contains pricing and risk metrics for a calendar spread position. A calendar spread buys a longer-dated option and sells a shorter-dated option at the same strike.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.CalendarSpreadPricing.FrontOption
member.summary: Gets or sets the pricing details for the front-month (short) option.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.CalendarSpreadPricing.BackOption
member.summary: Gets or sets the pricing details for the back-month (long) option.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.CalendarSpreadPricing.SpreadCost
member.summary: Gets or sets the net cost of the calendar spread (debit paid). SpreadCost = BackOption.Price - FrontOption.Price

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.CalendarSpreadPricing.SpreadDelta
member.summary: Gets or sets the net delta of the spread.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.CalendarSpreadPricing.SpreadGamma
member.summary: Gets or sets the net gamma of the spread.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.CalendarSpreadPricing.SpreadVega
member.summary: Gets or sets the net vega of the spread. Calendar spreads are long vega (benefit from IV increase).

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.CalendarSpreadPricing.SpreadTheta
member.summary: Gets or sets the net theta of the spread. Calendar spreads benefit from time decay of the front-month option.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.CalendarSpreadPricing.SpreadRho
member.summary: Gets or sets the net rho of the spread.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.CalendarSpreadPricing.MaxProfit
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum theoretical profit. Typically occurs when underlying is at strike at front-month expiration.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.CalendarSpreadPricing.MaxLoss
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum loss (limited to the debit paid).

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.CalendarSpreadPricing.BreakEven
member.summary: Gets or sets the breakeven price at front-month expiration.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.CalendarSpreadPricing.ProfitLossRatio
member.summary: Gets the profit/loss ratio.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.CalendarSpreadPricing.HasPositiveExpectedValue
member.summary: Gets whether the spread has positive expected value based on IV/RV ratio.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.CalendarSpreadPricing.Validate
member.summary: Validates the calendar spread pricing is internally consistent.

member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.OptionPricing
member.summary: Contains pricing and Greeks for a single option contract.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.OptionPricing.Price
member.summary: Gets or sets the theoretical option price.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.OptionPricing.Delta
member.summary: Gets or sets the option delta (∂Price/∂Underlying). Measures sensitivity to underlying price changes. Range: [0, 1] for calls, [-1, 0] for puts.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.OptionPricing.Gamma
member.summary: Gets or sets the option gamma (∂Delta/∂Underlying). Measures the rate of change of delta.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.OptionPricing.Vega
member.summary: Gets or sets the option vega (∂Price/∂Volatility). Measures sensitivity to volatility changes.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.OptionPricing.Theta
member.summary: Gets or sets the option theta (∂Price/∂Time). Measures time decay (typically negative).

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.OptionPricing.Rho
member.summary: Gets or sets the option rho (∂Price/∂Rate). Measures sensitivity to interest rate changes.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.OptionPricing.ImpliedVolatility
member.summary: Gets or sets the implied volatility used in pricing.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.OptionPricing.TimeToExpiry
member.summary: Gets or sets the time to expiration in years.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Pricing.OptionPricing.Moneyness
member.summary: Gets or sets the moneyness (Underlying / Strike).

member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.KellyPositionSizer
member.summary: Implements Kelly Criterion position sizing for options strategies. Uses fractional Kelly (typically 25% of full Kelly) for safety.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.KellyPositionSizer.CalculateFromHistory(System.Double,System.Collections.Generic.List{Alaris.Strategy.Risk.Trade},System.Double,Alaris.Strategy.Core.Signal)
member.summary: Calculates position size based on historical trade performance. Kelly Formula: f* = (p*b - q) / b where p = win probability, q = loss probability, b = win/loss ratio

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.KellyPositionSizer.AdjustForSignalStrength(System.Double,Alaris.Strategy.Core.Signal)
member.summary: Adjusts allocation based on signal strength.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.KellyPositionSizer.GetMinimumPosition(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns a minimum safe position size.

member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.Trade
member.summary: Represents a historical trade for Kelly Criterion calculation.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.Trade.EntryDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the trade entry date.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.Trade.ExitDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the trade exit date.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.Trade.ProfitLoss
member.summary: Gets or sets the profit or loss (negative for loss).

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.Trade.Symbol
member.summary: Gets or sets the underlying symbol.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.Trade.Strategy
member.summary: Gets or sets the trade type/strategy.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.Trade.HoldingPeriod
member.summary: Gets the holding period in days.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.Trade.IsWinner
member.summary: Gets whether the trade was profitable.

member.name: T:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.PositionSize
member.summary: Represents the sizing information for an options position.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.PositionSize.Contracts
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of option contracts to trade.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.PositionSize.AllocationPercent
member.summary: Gets or sets the percentage of portfolio allocated to this position.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.PositionSize.DollarAllocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the total dollar amount allocated.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.PositionSize.MaxLossPerContract
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum loss per contract.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.PositionSize.TotalRisk
member.summary: Gets or sets the total risk for the position.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.PositionSize.ExpectedProfitPerContract
member.summary: Gets or sets the expected profit per contract.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.PositionSize.KellyFraction
member.summary: Gets or sets the Kelly fraction used for sizing.

member.name: P:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.PositionSize.RiskRewardRatio
member.summary: Gets the risk/reward ratio.

member.name: M:Alaris.Strategy.Risk.PositionSize.Validate(System.Double)
member.summary: Validates that the position size is reasonable.
